body:
So what's the purpose of this PR?

On Sun, Mar 4, 2018, 3:14 PM Yan Facai (颜发才) <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> It seems that DropoutWrapper doesn't create varaible, hence variables
> property is always empty list via call, not add_variable explicitly.
